articles.description: The two-time Olympic champion and pole vault world record holder looks ready to write athletics history for a record 12th time. Duplantis is among the track and field stars set to compete at the sixth stop of the 2025 Diamond League series on Thursday, June 12.
articles.content:
We may be mere hours away from Armand Mondo Duplantis setting another men's pole vault world record.
The reigning double Olympic and two-time world outdoor gold medallist is in his usual sublime form and believes that a 6.28m clearance is imminent.

Researchers have created contact lenses that convert infrared light into visible light.
The lenses contain nanoparticles of gold and rare earth metals that enable night vision.
